name: Telophase
headline: Reach vulnerability inbox-zero

founders.name: Ethan Blackburn, Founder
founders.description: Excited about developer tools/infrastructure and AI. Always down for a hike :)

founders.description: Talk to me about Vulnerability Management

raw_markdown="[![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JQ7ykMCf6mfwFMFYTyCDN9Yy00.svg)](https://telophase.dev/<./>)

### The Last Mile of Vulnerability Management
Improve your remediation times by 90%.
[Book a Demo](https://telophase.dev/<./contact-page>)
### The Last Mile of Vulnerability Management
Improve your remediation times by 90%.
[Book a Demo](https://telophase.dev/<./contact-page>)
### The Last Mile of Vulnerability Management
Improve your remediation times by 90%.
[Book a Demo](https://telophase.dev/<./contact-page>)
### Intelligent Ticketing
Pull findings from all of your scanners, group and filter vulnerabilities, assign them to the right owner, and create tickets in your favorite system
Bi-directional integrations with Jira, Github, and ServiceNow.
Create custom rules to route tickets to the right team orintegrate with asset management tools.
Group vulnerabilities by asset, remediation action, or anyway you want.
![Supercharge your website phto](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UaiOUlUaWwT2Z5yVnKE7D1fWU.svg)
![Supercharge your website phto](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UaiOUlUaWwT2Z5yVnKE7D1fWU.svg)
![Supercharge your website photo 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Qi0pj1ZrP7lLfLwhllSzZIgs0DE.svg)
![Supercharge your website photo 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Qi0pj1ZrP7lLfLwhllSzZIgs0DE.svg)
### Your Security Source of Truth
Pull in data from all of your security tools. Create reports and dashboards to share with your team.
Reports for SLA history and breakdown by team.
Alert teams that are putting your compliance at risk.
Prebuilt integrations with your security tools.
### Risk Exceptions Engineers Don't Hate
Create risk exceptions for hundreds of vulnerabilities in less than 5 minutes. Drastically improve the review turnaround time for your GRC team.
Use our FedRAMP, StateRAMP, and HiTRUST compliant forms orcreate your own.
SLAs to help your GRC team stay on top of requests.
Customize your escalation process.
![Supercharge your website phto](https://framerusercontent.com/images/V4BDDO3pK99b6tj6CzNH9ayaWk.svg)
![Supercharge your website phto](https://framerusercontent.com/images/V4BDDO3pK99b6tj6CzNH9ayaWk.svg)
## An automation suite like no other
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PvDIDrD3u9yn4BG90QDyQLUjvNw.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PvDIDrD3u9yn4BG90QDyQLUjvNw.svg)
Hosted or On-Prem
Deploy Telophase on-prem or use our hosted SaaS solution. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VGbsZkbp5Wwi9LjtjKrNA1jqr0.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VGbsZkbp5Wwi9LjtjKrNA1jqr0.svg)
Supports Any Scanner
Integrate seamlessly with any scanner – Tenable, Wiz, AWS Security Hub, Qualys, and more.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cpBM92F57J8vxeKzhzfOFnnIz94.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cpBM92F57J8vxeKzhzfOFnnIz94.svg)
Reporting & Alerts
Stay informed about your authorization status with detailed reports and alerts, ensuring you're always audit-ready.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HTJtTClsT5R0Bb4K5KE1hXKGnrc.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HTJtTClsT5R0Bb4K5KE1hXKGnrc.svg)
Risk Exception Requests
Create and track risk exception requests directly in our platform.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/X4k4nS1RYHAZsSQ0DrZiqxcmt40.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/X4k4nS1RYHAZsSQ0DrZiqxcmt40.svg)
Generate POAM
One-click Plan Of Action & Milestones generation. No more custom scripts or spreadsheets.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SwNIX5JCpVXmANInEORckQebSw.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SwNIX5JCpVXmANInEORckQebSw.svg)
Asset Inventory
Automatically pull all your assets from your FedRAMP boundary to generate a comprehensive Asset Inventory.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/At3TKEIykZtPHyWlWMiAO2y2p8.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/At3TKEIykZtPHyWlWMiAO2y2p8.svg)
Ticket Routing
Create rules to route Jira tickets to the appropriate owner using vulnerability or asset context – AWS tags, region, account, package name, and more.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UclxcJPTDOzgrkTYlx8F6nASEHI.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/UclxcJPTDOzgrkTYlx8F6nASEHI.svg)
SLAs
Set up granular SLAs to ensure timely and effective remediation and mitigation.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/E0NfKqnhaJkvH5i6zXrla46Pe0.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/E0NfKqnhaJkvH5i6zXrla46Pe0.svg)
Remediation Roll-Ups
Consolidate Jira tickets with the same remediation action into a single, manageable ticket.
### Onboard in less time than it takes to produce your ConMon deliverables
See why the most efficient FedRamp Authorized teams are using Telophase
[Book a Demo](https://telophase.dev/<./contact-page>)

generated_description:
**Telophase** is a burgeoning tech startup founded in 2023, and it’s already making waves in vulnerability management. Headquartered in New York and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, Telophase is on a mission to help organizations achieve "inbox-zero" when it comes to vulnerability management.

Their approach is compelling: improving remediation times by an impressive 90%. With a lean team of just two, led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, they’re focused on delivering developer tools that streamline security processes for businesses.

On their website, [telophase.dev](https://telophase.dev), Telophase lays out a suite of features that amplify the effectiveness of vulnerability management. This includes:

- **Intelligent Ticketing:** Their platform pulls findings from various scanners, filters vulnerabilities, assigns them to the correct owner, and integrates seamlessly with systems like Jira, GitHub, and ServiceNow. Custom rules for ticket routing enhance efficiency.

- **A Single Source of Truth for Security:** Aggregating data from all security tools, they help teams create comprehensive reports and dashboards while alerting them to compliance gaps.

- **Streamlined Risk Exceptions:** Their system allows for rapid creation of risk exceptions for numerous vulnerabilities, significantly cutting down the review time for governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) teams.

- **Flexible Deployment Options:** Whether organizations prefer a hosted solution or on-prem installations, Telophase caters to both preferences, ensuring a smooth integration with existing systems.

- **Automation Suite:** Telophase boasts an automation suite that supports multiple security scanners (think Tenable, Wiz, AWS Security Hub, and more), aiding in the creation of POAMs (Plans of Action & Milestones) without unnecessary manual work.

This startup isn't just another player in the crowded B2B landscape; it's innovating the infrastructure around vulnerability management in a way that's accessible and efficient for engineering teams. As they gear up for broader implementation, it’ll be interesting to see how they revolutionize security management for their clients in the coming years. 

If you’re curious or interested in their offerings, you can **[book a demo](https://telophase.dev/contact-page)** to see their solutions in action.
